name: Crack Quest
description:
A game about a daring ace pilot and his control-tower colleague taking on mechs created by an evil pop-star witch. 

The game includes 2 stages, both of which have you take on an especially dangerous foe,  The gameplay involves navigating a small ship through a field of bullets (see: shoot-em-up/bullet hell). 

Music has been partially made by myself, partially stolen  from various videogame ost's
